title: OP权限问题
author: qq1185898110
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 上白丶慧泽音
replies.txt_content:
如有一些插件不一样的需要加admin
有些普通插件后面直接/插件名 reload
还有你配置文件大概设置不对吧
你锁想插件是那个
如lockette
lockette.admin.break - 设置为true
lockette.admin.bypass - 设置为true

replies.author: 心亂
replies.txt_content: 重载插件/reload    重载单个插件：每个插件都不同，比如ESS是/essentials reload . 领地插件:/resreload signshop：/signshop reload 正常的都是每个插件的母命令后+reload

replies.author: 李永杏啊
replies.txt_content: 你可以把商店移给小号

replies.author: GenjiKai
replies.txt_content:
你可以用这个命令
/mangaddp owner *
或者
/mangaddp admin *
前提是你装了GM插件
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-292672-1-3.html

replies.author: 矿工小周
replies.txt_content:
商店只有30个，配置文件28行开始limits:
    #Disable these if you're not using them! If this is false, the rest of this section is ignored
    use: false
    #The default number of shops players can make
    default: 1000000
    #Players with these permissions can create these amounts of shops.
    ranks:
        #Anyone with 'quickshop.vip' permissions, can create 20 shops instead of 10.
        quickshop.vip: 20 #Players with quickshop.vip can make 20 shops.复制代码
